name: The Client
description:
You've been tasked with breaking into an apartment and cracking the password to a laptop.

Each play of the game gives a new password, so if you get stuck just reload the page. The game is a submission to Trijam 170 and my semi-triumphant return to 3D programming in Godot (almost tried Unity for it 😁).

The assets took ages but fortunately don't count towards the 3 hours.* There are some required credits for the work:

  • Almost all 3D models come from Kenney
  • The handbag came from Free3d.com (which was down at the time of publication)
  • The music is Broke for Free by Night Owl
  • The sounds come from unadamlar and Klankbeeld
  • Javier Morales photographed the gloves - so I didn't have to

The box is either the apartment or laptop - you decide.

* this turned out not to be the case 😭
